document.full_text: a statewide grand jury in a report released on tuesday ripped the operation of the pennsylvania gaming control board, saying that it "neglected or wholly ignored ... public policy objectives" and failed to protect the public from unlawful gaming practices.
document.title: grand jury report blasts pennsylvania gaming control
lines_and_colors: a statewide grand jury in a report released on tuesday ripped the operation of the pennsylvania gaming control board, saying that it "neglected or wholly ignored ... public policy objectives" and failed to protect the public from unlawful gaming practices.
